revised_title: Differential Expression and Heterogeneity of Protein Kinase C in Nervous Tissues
tldr: This article discusses the heterogeneity and differential expression of protein kinase C in nervous tissues. The authors describe the structural differences, kinetic properties, and substrate specificities of various protein kinase C subspecies, highlighting their roles in transducing physiological and pathological signals in different cell types.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cellular and Molecular Biology
